text: Splash and Bubbles is an American computer-animated television show created by John Tartaglia. Splash and Bubbles premiered in the USA on November 23, 2016. It is distributed and produced by Herschend Studios. == Cast == * Ripple (Aymee Garcia) * Dunk (Raymond Carr) * Polly and Bell (Alice Dinnean and Donna Kimball) Category:English-language television programs Category:2010s American animated television series Category:2016 American television series debuts Category:2018 American television series endings
title: Splash and Bubbles
